original: zas ma zhu ba dang / spos pa dang / skran nad dang / chu dang / khrag skyugs pa dang / bad kan gyi zug gzer rab tu sel @135b lo; ;bad kan gyi nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: zas ma zhu ba dang / spos pa dang / skran nad dang / chu dang / khrag skyugs pa dang / bad kan gyi zug gzer rab tu sel @135b lo; ;bad kan gyi nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: This dhāraṇī for curing phlegm disorders completely cures indigestion, flatulence, tumors, water and blood vomiting, and phlegm pain.
